===========================================

I first started MCZone/Avicus/Skywars when it was at it's birthplace.  I received my first couple kills playing the sky-wars map when this server didn't have a hub and only sky-wars.  This happened about 1-2 years ago in 2011 I think in November. It was so fun until the they added the MCZone hub and sky-wars had a glitch where you couldn't pick items up.  I was then introduced to Nebula where my favorite map was Ternio.  I have been present for all of Funkys updates and have a couple tricks up my sleeve :)).

Here is a little picture of me when I was little.
